TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed IOHIDElementCollectionType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes different types of HID collections.
Docs.remarks: Collections identify a relationship between two or more elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDElementCollectionType Application = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Identifies item groups serving different purposes in a single device.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDElementCollectionType Logical = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Used when a set of data items form a composite data structure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDElementCollectionType NamedArray = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Contains an array of selector usages.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDElementCollectionType Physical = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Used for a set of data items that represent data points collected at one geometric point.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDElementCollectionType Report = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Wraps all the fields in a report.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDElementCollectionType UsageModifier = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Modifies the meaning of the usage attached to the encompassing collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.HID.IOHIDElementCollectionType UsageSwitch = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Modifies the meaning of the usage it contains.
